paragraphs.text: Also, you’re probably thinking so much that you’re missing out of life. Did you notice the sunshine this morning when you woke up? Or the raindrops? Did you notice the smell of your coffee? Did you feel the texture of your cereals?
paragraphs.name: c388
8e18
paragraphs.text: If your answer is no, you definitely need to get out of your head. Stop thinking and start feeling.

paragraphs.name: c388
paragraphs.text: Also, you’re probably thinking so much that you’re missing out of life. Did you notice the sunshine this morning when you woke up? Or the raindrops? Did you notice the smell of your coffee? Did you feel the texture of your cereals?
Thoughts have no use. 99% of them that is.
paragraphs.name: e050

paragraphs.text: Awareness.
Thinking about how you can solve problems. A problem is just an unanswered question. Put your brain to use and think about how you can solve problems. There are a lot of those on this earth.

paragraphs.text: I don’t really believe in willpower (I wrote about it here). I look at controlling your thoughts as a muscle. It’s something I practice daily—just like exercise. And you become better the more you practice it.

6c31dabce401.title: This is a terrific piece, Darius, and completely hits on what I’ve only been realizing recently…

paragraphs.text: This is a terrific piece, Darius, and completely hits on what I’ve only been realizing recently, that we can control our thoughts just like we control a muscle. Thanks to this article, I finished my night immersed in the joy of rocking my baby girl to sleep rather than using the task as an excuse to run through some useless thoughts as I usually would. Thanks for the save.

f371719e1950.title: Yes, awareness is very powerful and can transform everyone’s life for the better.

paragraphs.text: Yes, awareness is very powerful and can transform everyone’s life for the better. It’s pretty much the key to an amazing life. But obtaining true awareness is very tricky because it takes so much time and therefore patience. A serious, life-long, intrinsically motivated commitment is absolutely necessary to attain peace of mind.
paragraphs.name: fd37

a089d45f563b.title: the art of mindfulness is a skill that requires constant practice; there are audiobooks out there…

paragraphs.text: the art of mindfulness is a skill that requires constant practice; there are audiobooks out there to listen on how to practice this skill. google them. it will open a whole new world for those who are under constant stress and just need to shut down their brain to be more efficient.
paragraphs.name: 4e02

f6002425e267.title: I spent a lot of time and energy thinking … and worrying.

paragraphs.text: I spent a lot of time and energy thinking … and worrying. When I grew older, I worried about being old, sick and poor until I cracked up. It took a while to realize that pills and therapy weren’t going to help. I’d have to do it myself. I read about chronic anxiety, took classes, talked to people and finally I knew what I had to do… RETRAIN MY BRAIN…
Thank you life sensei. Hey, could you walk around with me everyday for a few weeks and smack me upside the head when I start to do this?
paragraphs.name: 2e63
